text.tspan: Contribution to value added vs. share of CO₂ emissions in
Contribution of individual sectors to net economic output versus its share of total national carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions in 2009.
Sectors which lie above the line contribute more to the value added than the emissions in the United States. Direct emissions of
